title: Slime Slayer: Treasure Hunt
description: A platformer game built using javascript where you must collect the coins and make it to the finish line. Can be accessed through this link: https://editor.p5js.org/NateA/sketches/w1AybEy0y

title: Detectify
description: A program that is used to detect faces, and eyes in provided videos, can also detect features using a webcam or other video providing devices.

title: Mapify
description: A program that generates a map of the world, with volcanoes shown on the map, a working coordinate system that appears on mouse click, and a search feature for the names of the volcanoes.
